subject: [perl #43055] [CAGE] Revise t/src/io.t To Use Non-libparrot C Testing Functions
body:
# New Ticket Created by  chromatic 
# Please include the string:  [perl #43055]
# in the subject line of all future correspondence about this issue. 
# 


Revise tests 16,17, and 19 in t/src/io.t to use the C testing functions 
created by closing #43054.
